alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Hutchinson; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 12:59PM MDT until May 11 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in South Dakota... James River near Scotland affecting Hutchinson, Yankton and Bon Homme Counties. James River above Yankton affecting Yankton County. James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Scotland. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.5 feet, 431st Avenue is flooded where it crosses the river in northwestern Yankton County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 PM CDT Thursday was 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Wednesday evening and continue falling Thursday. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun James River Scotland 13.0 15.0 Thu 1 pm 14.8 14.5 14.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday afternoon.
